jurls.reinforcementlearning.domains.arcade.gui

Interface AbstractUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentGUI, NullUI

    public interface AbstractUI
    An interface describing a UI. This gets subclassed into a graphical UI, a command-line UI, etc... as needed.
    Author:
    Marc G. Bellemare
